group_1.narration: And dawn returned to all regions@in the dream world.

group_1.textRight: I'm sorry.
I was worried that anything I said would@break the rules laid out in the grimoire.
I really couldn't mention a thing.

group_1.textLeft: It's not your fault.
Everything you did was to save Darc.

group_1.textRight: Thank you, Iroha and Yachiyo.
When I told you about that church...
It was right after I realized we could speak@with those outside the dream.
If I missed that opportunity, then I'm not@sure I could've asked for anyone's help.
You have my gratitude.

group_1.textLeft: No, we didn't do much!
It sounds like Lady Luck was on our side.

group_1.textRight: Everyone.
I hate to change the subject, but...
Tourelles has surrendered, so the fortress@guarding Orléans is no longer an obstacle.
All that's left to do is to cross the bridge@over the Loire River...
And break into the city!

group_1.textLeft: Then there are still enemies in Orléans?

group_1.textRight: Yes. We also don't know Corbeau's@whereabouts.
She will surely block our path.

group_1.textLeft: We're looking for the Cathedral of the@Holy Cross, right?
It feels weird saying it to the person whose@dream we are in, but...
Once you ring the bell, Darc...
You should wake up in the real world!

group_1.textRight: Yes. Then this world...this dream France,@will cease to exist.
And we'll all awaken in the real world.

group_1.textLeft: Then what will happen?

group_1.textRight: Your memories will begin to fade once the@curse is lifted.
Before long, you'll think that this was all@just a dream.

group_1.textLeft: What? We'll forget?
Everything that happened in this world?
Even though things unfolded much differently@than what's written in our history books...
Everything that happened here will become@nothing more than a dream.

group_1.textRight: This is one after all.
I guess this will be farewell.
Iroha, Yachiyo...

group_1.textLeft: How sad...
We were just beginning to get to know each @other...

group_1.textRight: But it's a happy farewell.
Because even if we return to different@places, we believe in the same future.

group_1.textLeft: That's right.

group_1.textCenter: I want that future back no matter what!
Your answer told me all I needed to know.
It sounds as though there is hope for the@future indeed!

group_1.textLeft: Yes!
So after this dream ends...
Let's keep fighting for all of our futures!

group_1.textRight: Well said!
Let's head out then.

group_1.textLeft: Father and his soldiers are waiting for us.
Yes.
We go now...
...to bring light to what is yet to come!
